title: Pleasing the Pack
description: In late 1800s England, an American woman named Elizabeth fell in with a pack of werewolves and found herself giving up her body in all new ways, as well as giving her heart to the pack's darkly handsome leader, Ezra. Meanwhile they are hunted by a fearsome religious leader called The Elder. Will she ultimately choose to help the wolves or the righteous man who hunts them - and will pleasing the pack destroy her own humanity? Part 1 of a series.This volume includes 9600 words with graphic descriptions of acts such as...- Group sex (a lot)- Exhibitionism and voyeurism- Romantic sex and love- Masturbation- Fantasy/monster sex (not too much of this)- Humiliation and degradation- Rough sex
author: Dani Williams
